TopicTitle: Fellow Forumers, I need help, and QUICK

Articles.Content: So, I'm headed to my local LaserQuest tomorrow, and it's my first time. I would appreciate any help.

Have fun

If you have never been before, its dark, lots of running, expect to be knackered. Great fun though.

Don't hold the trigger down. They aren't full-auto, you'll need to fire quickly. If your on a team, find somewhere relatively high (if there's any height, there are 3 floors where i go.) and snipe them. If it's free for all, stay on the lowest level and move around as much as possible. Bouncing the beam off of mirrors helps.
Thanks. In free for all, do they let you make non-official teams, Hunger. Games style?
So, today it is. In less than 2 hours, I will enter the arena.

Laser tag arenas are an epic experience.

But, I think you're worrying yourself a bit too much.
Good luck! Never been to one, sounds fun.
Yeah, I am probably overthinking it. But, it helps to know what's happening, what's going on, and how to win.
It went quite well! I didn't get top spot or anything, but I did fairly well.
